pkgmetadata.longdescription: svgpathtools is a collection of tools for manipulating and analyzing SVG Path objects and Bezier curves. It provides functions for reading, writing, and displaying SVG files, as well as tools for computing arc lengths, bounding boxes, intersections, and other geometric properties of SVG paths.
svgpathtools是一组用于操作和分析SVG路径对象和贝塞尔曲线的工具集。它提供了 读取、写入和显示SVG文件的功能，以及用于计算弧长、边界框、交点和SVG路径其他 几何属性的工具。
